item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I’m Broderic and I have no clue how to use computers. I’m currently persuing a degree in IT with a focus on cybersecurity. I created this site for a couple reasons. The first being for me to have somewhere to write about and publish whatever I find interesting. The second being I want to document any projects I’m working on. Documentation is a huge part of IT and I don’t think it hurts to practice that skill every now and then.

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo is interesting… This will be my rant on hugo. Why it’s amazing and also completely stupid.
